### Tender Description
The Correctional Service of Canada requires the services of an experienced third-party contractor to perform fire protection services at Kingston Penitentiary. The contractor will be responsible for conducting annual fire alarm inspections, periodic sprinkler inspections, and annual fire hydrant flow tests. The contractor must also ensure compliance with health and safety requirements and regulations.
